Attributes Set by File Type

Some of the archive attributes are set on a file type basis and others on all file types that are stored in archives. For example, the Translate EOL attribute is set by file type because this attribute should only be set for text files; setting this attribute for binary files may corrupt the archives. The Exclusive Lock is an attribute this is typically set the same for all archives regardless of file type. The attributes that are set by file type are:

  • Expand Keywords
  • Store Deltas
  • Translate EOL
  • Column Masking
  • Newline Character
  • Record Length
  • Column Renumbering
